attributes.action: Allow safe motorbike only access and free parking by the River Dee, Chester.
attributes.additional_details: For years bikers have parked up safely along this stretch of road to enjoy a day out, which also provides enjoyment to pedestrians. Please can the government intervene with current council plans to restrict access and issue fines to motorcyclists.
attributes.background: To allow safe motorbike only access and free parking by the River Dee, Chester. In between the Cafe at the Walls and The Groves.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the local authority and landowners

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
